Package ru.nsu.fit.tretyakov

Class Gradebook

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.nsu.fit.tretyakov.Gradebook
  • public class Gradebook
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the student's grade book. In it user can get information about his score, subjects, average grade point and his honor diploma. User can also get list of all subjects with specific credit type.

        Parameters:

        group - is the required student's group
        numberOfGradeBook - is the required number of student's grade book

    • Method Detail

      • addSemester

        public boolean addSemester​(java.lang.Integer semester)
        This method adds a semester to the grade book.
        Parameters:
        semester - is the required semester.
        Returns:
        true if a semester was successfully added. Otherwise, return false.

      • addSubject

        public void addSubject​(java.lang.Integer semester,
                       java.lang.String subject,
                       ru.nsu.fit.tretyakov.Gradebook.CreditType creditType)
                throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        This method adds a specific subject WITHOUT a value to the semester in grade book.
        Parameters:
        semester - is the required semester that contains current semester.
        subject - is the subject which will be evaluated by current value.
        creditType - is the credit type of the current subject
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there is already exist a semester or subject with specific value.

      • getGrade

        public java.lang.Integer getGrade​(java.lang.Integer semester,
                                  java.lang.String subject)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Getter of the subject's grade.
        Parameters:
        semester - is the specific semester in the grade book.
        subject - is the required subject in specific semester in the grade book.
        Returns:
        value of the required subject in semester.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if required semester or grade are don't exist in the grade book.

      • setGrade

        public void setGrade​(java.lang.Integer semester,
                     java.lang.String subject,
                     java.lang.Integer value)
              throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Setter of the subject's grade.
        Parameters:
        semester - is the required semester in the grade book.
        subject - is the required subject in the specific semester.
        value - is the required value of the subject in the grade book.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the passed value isn't validated.

      • getSubjectsByType

        public java.util.List<ru.nsu.fit.tretyakov.Gradebook.Subject> getSubjectsByType​(java.lang.Integer semester,
                                                                                ru.nsu.fit.tretyakov.Gradebook.CreditType type)
        Getter of all subjects in specific semester with specific credit type
        Parameters:
        semester - is the required semester where user needs to find subjects
        type - is the required credit type of subject
        Returns:
        ArrayList of all subjects in current semester with passed credit type

      • printGradebook

        public void printGradebook()
        This method prints student's grade book as table with semesters, subjects, credit types of all subjects and grades of these subjects.

      • getHonorDiploma

        public boolean getHonorDiploma()
        Getter of the honor diploma. It computes the possibility of getting the honor diploma.
        Returns:
        true if user can get the honor diploma. Otherwise, return false.
